{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Frontend / Backend Developer",
  "description": "Knowvas Technology Limited is a Nigerian-based tech startup revolutionising digital publishing across Africa. We provide a secure, AI-powered platform that enables authors, publishers, and content creators to publish, protect, and profit from ebooks, audiobooks, comics, magazines, and more.

Our mission is to fight piracy, amplify African voices, and empower creators to earn from their intellectual property through direct sales and subscription-based models&nbsp;&mdash; all while offering powerful tools for reader analytics and engagement.&nbsp;We&rsquo;re a small but driven team, building something bold and meaningful for Africa&rsquo;s digital future. If you&#39;re excited about storytelling, technology, and building impactful products, Knowvas is the place to grow with purpose.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Frontend / Backend Developer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Africa&rsquo;s first secure, GenAI-powered digital publishing platform is expanding - and YOU could be part of the movement.


Requirements


	Minimum Qualification: SSCE with good communication skills.
	Age: 18 &ndash; 25.
	Attitude matters: willingness to learn + teamwork.


Skills We&rsquo;re Looking For:


	React.
	JavaScript.
	Node.js.
	TailwindCSS.
	TypeScript (advantage).
	Python / Flask / Next.js.
	Good grasp of state management &amp; props.


Why Join Us?


	Be part of a visionary platform shaping Africa&rsquo;s publishing future.
	Work hands-on with secure digital publishing &amp; GenAI.
	Learn, grow, and innovate with a dynamic team.
	Exciting opportunities for career growth.
	Be part of Africa&rsquo;s digital publishing revolution.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Cover Letter (PDF only), and link to Portfolio to:&nbsp;support@knowvas.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Do not send the link to your CV; it must be sent as an attachment, and your cover letter must be typed in the email body.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-01",

Frontend / Backend Developer Job at Knowvas Technology Limited




        
    

        
        Knowvas Technology Limited is a Nigerian-based tech startup revolutionising digital publishing across Africa. We provide a secure, AI-powered platform that enables authors, publishers, and content creators to publish, protect, and profit from ebooks, audiobooks, comics, magazines, and more.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Our mission is to fight piracy, amplify African voices, and empower creators to earn from their intellectual property through direct sales and subscription-based models — all while offering powerful tools for reader analytics and engagement. We’re a small but driven team, building something bold and meaningful for Africa’s digital future. If you're excited about storytelling, technology, and building impactful products, Knowvas is the place to grow with purpose.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Frontend / Backend Developer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Africa’s first secure, GenAI-powered digital publishing platform is expanding - and YOU could be part of the movement.


Requirements


	Minimum Qualification: SSCE with good communication skills.
	Age: 18 – 25.
	Attitude matters: willingness to learn + teamwork.


Skills We’re Looking For:


	React.
	JavaScript.
	Node.js.
	TailwindCSS.
	TypeScript (advantage).
	Python / Flask / Next.js.
	Good grasp of state management & props.


Why Join Us?


	Be part of a visionary platform shaping Africa’s publishing future.
	Work hands-on with secure digital publishing & GenAI.
	Learn, grow, and innovate with a dynamic team.
	Exciting opportunities for career growth.
	Be part of Africa’s digital publishing revolution.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Cover Letter (PDF only), and link to Portfolio to: support@knowvas.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Do not send the link to your CV; it must be sent as an attachment, and your cover letter must be typed in the email body.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Officer",
  "description": "Recycling Ant is a company committed to environmental protection in Nigeria. We have eight transit warehouses all over the country. They are used to recover various types of renewable resources, reduce environmental pollution, and promote the industrial development of Nigeria. Recycling Ant has opened a franchise model in Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Providing introductory information, such as a product manual explanation, to prospective and new customers
	Handling customer complaints and troubleshooting issues with products or services
	Following up with clients or customers by phone, web chat or email to check that they&rsquo;re still satisfied with their purchases or services received
	Accessing databases to retrieve account information for customers
	Letting customers know about additional products or services that might benefit them
	Updating customer records following each contact


Job Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Business Administrationor its equivalent&nbsp;with 2-5 years of experience.
	Good interpersonal communication skills and computer savvy
	Female only.


Salary
N70,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },

Customer Service Officer Job at Recycling Ant




        
    

        
        Recycling Ant is a company committed to environmental protection in Nigeria. We have eight transit warehouses all over the country. They are used to recover various types of renewable resources, reduce environmental pollution, and promote the industrial development of Nigeria. Recycling Ant has opened a franchise model in Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Providing introductory information, such as a product manual explanation, to prospective and new customers
	Handling customer complaints and troubleshooting issues with products or services
	Following up with clients or customers by phone, web chat or email to check that they’re still satisfied with their purchases or services received
	Accessing databases to retrieve account information for customers
	Letting customers know about additional products or services that might benefit them
	Updating customer records following each contact


Job Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administrationor its equivalent with 2-5 years of experience.
	Good interpersonal communication skills and computer savvy
	Female only.


Salary
N70,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administration Manager",
  "description": "LEAM Consulting is the foremost consulting firm which stands out in areas of professional certification training, HR advisory services, Business Development/Startup and IT consulting services in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administration Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in security management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments


Responsibilities


	Oversee and support the security team, assign security officers to specific patrol areas &amp; Beat, ensure duties are performed effectively and address any issues providing training and disciplinary action where necessary
	Monitor team and individual performance, provide feedback, and hold regular team briefings.
	Manage day-to-day security operations and become familiar with the site layout or beat allocation to create and implement effective policies and procedures.
	Oversee day to day activities of each department in the office,Incident Management and Emergency
	Respond to and investigate any security breaches or incidents, escort unauthorized personnel from the site, conduct emergency drills, and assist with evacuation in an emergency, liaising with the emergency services where necessary.


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc in any relevant field of study
	2-3 years of experience in a security role, with supervisory experience preferred.
	Strong knowledge of security protocols and emergency response procedures.
	Excellent leadership and team management skills.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills for interaction with staff and stakeholders.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@leamconsulting.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;For more information, WhatsApp:&nbsp;09047710414.",

Administration Manager Job at LEAM Consulting




        
    

        
        LEAM Consulting is the foremost consulting firm which stands out in areas of professional certification training, HR advisory services, Business Development/Startup and IT consulting services in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administration Manager

Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in security management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Oversee and support the security team, assign security officers to specific patrol areas & Beat, ensure duties are performed effectively and address any issues providing training and disciplinary action where necessary
	Monitor team and individual performance, provide feedback, and hold regular team briefings.
	Manage day-to-day security operations and become familiar with the site layout or beat allocation to create and implement effective policies and procedures.
	Oversee day to day activities of each department in the office,Incident Management and Emergency
	Respond to and investigate any security breaches or incidents, escort unauthorized personnel from the site, conduct emergency drills, and assist with evacuation in an emergency, liaising with the emergency services where necessary.


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc in any relevant field of study
	2-3 years of experience in a security role, with supervisory experience preferred.
	Strong knowledge of security protocols and emergency response procedures.
	Excellent leadership and team management skills.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills for interaction with staff and stakeholders.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@leamconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more information, WhatsApp: 09047710414.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Personal Assistant to the President",
  "description": "Cinqteos Group is a diversified firm operating across business consulting and financial market services. We deliver expert solutions in corporate strategy, restructuring, governance, risk, compliance, brokerage, investment advisory, and capital market development. We are committed to empowering businesses and investors across Africa through innovation in the execution of our services to offer our clients real and sustainable value.

To achieve our mission, we need people who are smart and self-driven with an execution-focused approach. We believe that work should be a truly fulfilling experience for the people who render services and the clients that benefit, so we strive to create a work environment that allows everyone to thrive personally and professionally while creating real value in the world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant to the President
Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Carry out personal assignments and tasks, as required, to assist the President.
	Manage the President&rsquo;s daily calendar and appointments.
	Manage personal projects on behalf of the President, where required.
	Draft or proofread personal letters, notes, or simple documents, where required.
	Handle phone calls, emails, and other correspondence,where required.
	Liaise with internal and external stakeholders on behalf of the President, where required.
	Develop and maintain record-keeping/filing systems for official and personal records.
	Manage the President&rsquo;s travel arrangements and bookings.
	Process petty cash disbursements and prepare expense reports.
	Keeping track of important milestone dates, events or renewal dates for memberships, subscriptions, or personal commitments.
	Coordinate and manage the tasks and assignments of other personal staff or vendors.
	Handle visitor reception and general office hospitality arrangements.
	Support or manage special projects.
	Support the planning of private functions, dinners, or small-scale events.
	Ensure the President&rsquo;s office runs smoothly.


Educational Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in any field.
	2 - 3 years of experience as a Personal Assistant to a Company Executive.
	Male candidates are preferred but females can apply.


Personal Attributes &amp; Skills Required:


	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Professional etiquette.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and discretion.
	Possessing a high degree of integrity.
	Reliability and resourcefulness.
	Professional appearance and attitude.
	Ability to work independently.
	Good interpersonal skills.
	Flexible and adaptable.
	Punctual and self-disciplined.


What We Offer


	A collaborative and inclusive work environment where professional growth is valued.
	Opportunities to work closely with senior leadership and contribute to strategic decision-making.
	Flexible work arrangements.
	Health insurance, paid time-off, and other workplace benefits.
	The opportunity to make a meaningful impact within a fast-growing firm.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;contact@cinqteos.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Personal Assistant to the President Job Application &ndash; [Your Name]&rdquo; as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;We appreciate all applications; however, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.",

Personal Assistant to the President Job at Cinqteos Group




        
    

        
        Cinqteos Group is a diversified firm operating across business consulting and financial market services. We deliver expert solutions in corporate strategy, restructuring, governance, risk, compliance, brokerage, investment advisory, and capital market development. We are committed to empowering businesses and investors across Africa through innovation in the execution of our services to offer our clients real and sustainable value.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



To achieve our mission, we need people who are smart and self-driven with an execution-focused approach. We believe that work should be a truly fulfilling experience for the people who render services and the clients that benefit, so we strive to create a work environment that allows everyone to thrive personally and professionally while creating real value in the world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant to the President
Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Carry out personal assignments and tasks, as required, to assist the President.
	Manage the President’s daily calendar and appointments.
	Manage personal projects on behalf of the President, where required.
	Draft or proofread personal letters, notes, or simple documents, where required.
	Handle phone calls, emails, and other correspondence,where required.
	Liaise with internal and external stakeholders on behalf of the President, where required.
	Develop and maintain record-keeping/filing systems for official and personal records.
	Manage the President’s travel arrangements and bookings.
	Process petty cash disbursements and prepare expense reports.
	Keeping track of important milestone dates, events or renewal dates for memberships, subscriptions, or personal commitments.
	Coordinate and manage the tasks and assignments of other personal staff or vendors.
	Handle visitor reception and general office hospitality arrangements.
	Support or manage special projects.
	Support the planning of private functions, dinners, or small-scale events.
	Ensure the President’s office runs smoothly.


Educational Qualifications & Experience


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in any field.
	2 - 3 years of experience as a Personal Assistant to a Company Executive.
	Male candidates are preferred but females can apply.


Personal Attributes & Skills Required:


	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Professional etiquette.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and discretion.
	Possessing a high degree of integrity.
	Reliability and resourcefulness.
	Professional appearance and attitude.
	Ability to work independently.
	Good interpersonal skills.
	Flexible and adaptable.
	Punctual and self-disciplined.


What We Offer


	A collaborative and inclusive work environment where professional growth is valued.
	Opportunities to work closely with senior leadership and contribute to strategic decision-making.
	Flexible work arrangements.
	Health insurance, paid time-off, and other workplace benefits.
	The opportunity to make a meaningful impact within a fast-growing firm.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: contact@cinqteos.com using “Personal Assistant to the President Job Application – [Your Name]” as the subject of the email.

Note: We appreciate all applications; however, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

  "title": "Social Media / Content Specialist",
  "description": "Philban Consulting Limited - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media / Content Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client is looking to hire a proficient Socila Media/Content Specialist, The role involves designing and producing engaging content for both hotel and restaurant brands, managing social media platforms, running promotional campaigns, and monitoring online engagement.
	Strong design skills, and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
	Support other social media-related activities as requested by management.
	Attend the hotel 2 times a week for on-site content capture or campaign activities and flexibility to come in if required.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	Proven experience in social media management and digital content creation.
	Proficiency in design and video editing tools (e.g., Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, CapCut).
	Experience running social media and digital ad campaigns, including Google Ads.
	Ability to work both remotely and on-site as required.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;philbannig@ymail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Social Media / Content Specialist Job at Philban Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Philban Consulting Limited - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media / Content Specialist

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client is looking to hire a proficient Socila Media/Content Specialist, The role involves designing and producing engaging content for both hotel and restaurant brands, managing social media platforms, running promotional campaigns, and monitoring online engagement.
	Strong design skills, and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
	Support other social media-related activities as requested by management.
	Attend the hotel 2 times a week for on-site content capture or campaign activities and flexibility to come in if required.


Qualifications & Skills


	Proven experience in social media management and digital content creation.
	Proficiency in design and video editing tools (e.g., Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, CapCut).
	Experience running social media and digital ad campaigns, including Google Ads.
	Ability to work both remotely and on-site as required.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: philbannig@ymail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
